plugin.name: Embers XD Flames 🔥
plugin.description:
This option should provide more realistic fire shading and more flexibility. By design, the fire color is fairly neutral, yellowish in tone, with no major color cast in order to allow for more flexible tuning to suit stylistically different ENB presets.
💡 You can tune the fire intensity and color by using ENB GUI to adjust [FIRE] parameters. In general, increasing curve will make the fire more red whereas decreasing will work the opposite, making it less red. For a more cinematic look you should increase the intensity. There's no bloom baked in so please use a bloom shader if you prefer fire to have a red glow.

plugin.name: Embers XD Flames (Burnt Orange)
plugin.description: Embers XD style flames in burnt orange color.

plugin.name: Embers XD Flames (Golden Yellow)
plugin.description: Embers XD style flames but more yellow than orange or red.

plugin.name: Embers HD Flames
plugin.description:
The classic Embers HD style flames. This option will also offer better performance than the Embers XD style flames. Embers HD is not required.
💡 Any patches for the original Embers HD are not compatible.

plugin.name: Inferno Flames
plugin.description: Provides compatibility with Inferno by using the Embers XD style embers and campsite assets coupled with Inferno style flames. Make sure you have Inferno installed and that Embers XD has priority over it. When this option is selected neither Torches Add-On or Fire Magick Add-On can be installed, nor any of the patches that depend on either. Inferno courtesy of the one and only iRetrospect with additional credits to illustrous rheadude for Ultimate HD Fire Effects back in the day.

plugin.name: Vanilla Flames
plugin.description: This option is provided to ensure compatibility with fire effect modifications other than Inferno that replace vanilla textures. When this option is selected neither Torches Add-On or Fire Magick Add-On can be installed, nor any of the patches that depend on either.

plugin.name: High Quality
plugin.description: This is the default option with high quality particle light effects. Make sure "iMaxDesired" in SkyrimPrefs.ini is set at least to a value of 6000.

plugin.name: Optimized
plugin.description:
Certain particle light effects are optimized for better performance, the trade-off being less dynamic particle light animation and more obvious pop in/out. This option is worth trying in case you notice stuttering while many particle effects (including complex particle lights) are active at the same time.
💡 If you're using ENBSeries: Since this optimization comes with a slight visual penalty, you might first want to consider disabling Normal Mapping Shadows and/or reducing the quality of particle lights in the ENBSeries GUI to increase performance.

plugin.name: Normal
plugin.description: This is the default option with standard particle light intensity.

plugin.name: Double
plugin.description: Double the intensity of certain particle lights.

plugin.name: Standard
plugin.description: A standard ESP plugin which all the included patches have as a Master, when applicable.

plugin.name: Lux Orbis ⚠️
plugin.description:
⚠️ Embers XD compatibility patches for EXTERIOR CELL modifcations (including city Worldspaces like Windhelm and Whiterun) should NOT BE USED when this option is chosen and you should instead rely on patches provided with Lux Orbis.
This is a special plugin for Lux Orbis that contains no worldspace modifications since Lux Orbis already takes care of everything that is needed. The name of the plugin is always "Embers XD.esp" for compatibility reasons so please don't report it as a bug.

plugin.name: Enderal ⚠️
plugin.description:
This is a special plugin for Enderal.
⚠️ Embers XD compatibility patches for EXTERIOR CELL modifcations should NOT BE USED when this option is chosen. The name of the plugin is always "Embers XD.esp" for compatibility reasons so please don't report it as a bug.

plugin.name: Install Fire Magick Add-On
plugin.description: An Embers XD style overhaul to fire spells. Requires Embers XD style flames to be selected.

plugin.name: Install Forges Add-On
plugin.description: An Embers XD style overhaul to forges.

plugin.name: Install Torches Add-On
plugin.description:
An Embers XD style overhaul to torches, both carried and wall-mounted. Requires Embers XD style flames to be selected in the flames customization step.
⚠️ If you use Mathy's Medieval Torch or Smoking Torches, please make sure to select the relevant patch in the patch selection step since it's not done automatically by the installer. If you use Mathy's Medieval Torch together with Smoking Torches, please only choose the patch for Mathy's Medieval Torch for Smoking Torches.

plugin.name: Install Lava Craters Add-On
plugin.description: Improves Solstheim lava craters and scattered lava rocks.

plugin.name: Fuller Inn Firepit Fires
plugin.description: Adds more flames to the inn firepits and makes them appear fuller. Note that his option may reduce performance. Requires legacy Embers XD style flames (default Embers XD flame style already features improved inn firepit fires) and makes no difference when using the optimized installation option.

plugin.name: Alternative Torch Flame
plugin.description:
An alternative torch flame style for the default torch. Only supported for the Embers XD Orange and Yellow flame style.
⚠️ DO NOT USE WITH NON-STICKY TORCH.

plugin.name: No Parallax
plugin.description: Disables parallax.

plugin.name: Black Torch Smoke
plugin.description: Replaces the default grey torch smoke with thick black smoke. Only applicable when using Smoking Torches or Mathy's Medieval Torch for Smoking Torches.

plugin.name: No Torch Particle Light
plugin.description: Disables particle light from player carried torch. Not compatible with Embers HD flame style.

plugin.name: Non-Sticky Torch Flame
plugin.description: A custom torch flame that doesn't stick to the torch while moving. You probably don't want to use this if you like to sprint around a lot because small floating flames are left behind during rapid character movement. Not compatible with Embers HD flame style.

plugin.name: Reduced Embers Glow (-50%)
plugin.description: Reduces the glow of campsite embers and logs by 50%, useful if you want to use high [WINDOWLIGHT] values. Also reduces the glow of forges if Forges Add-On is installed.

plugin.name: Reduced Embers Glow (-75%)
plugin.description: Reduces the glow of campsite embers and logs by 75%, useful if you want to use extreme [WINDOWLIGHT] values. Also reduces the glow of forges if Forges Add-On is installed.

plugin.name: No Burnt Wood Glow
plugin.description: Disables the glow of charred wood rubble in Helgen and elsewhere, effectively making it look like it has cooled down.

plugin.name: Reduced Fake Glow
plugin.description: Reduces the intensity of the yellow glow surrounding the flames in case it's too bright with your ENB preset. Note that you can also control this type of glow with [LIGHTSPRITE] parameters of ENBSeries but that settings will affect all objects that employ the same shaders (for example many spell effects and Draugr eyes).

plugin.name: Remove Fake Glow
plugin.description: Removes the yellow glow surrounding the flames completely.

plugin.name: Orange Embers
plugin.description: Turns embers orange/red when using the yellow flame color, not applicable otherwise.

plugin.name: Less Flying Embers
plugin.description: Reduces the number of flying embers emitted from fires for a possibly more realistic experience.

plugin.name: Minimize Light Leaks
plugin.description: Minimizes light leaks caused by particle lights but at the same time makes them smaller.

plugin.name: Remove Snow
plugin.description: Removes snow cover from snowy campsites so that they can look correct with summer mods.

plugin.name: Particle Light for Vanilla Torch
plugin.description: Simply adds particle lights to vanilla torch without changing the flame or anything else about the torch.

plugin.name: Solitude Braziers
plugin.description: Places fires on Solitude walls into braziers as in vanilla game they are simply lying on the stone. Requires Base Object Swapper.

plugin.name: Inferno Tweaks by SMB92
plugin.description: Reduces fire intensity and fixes a number of inconsistencies. Recommended.

plugin.name: No Magick Particle Lights
plugin.description: Disables complex particle lights for Magick Add-On effects. Only compatible with legacy Embers XD flame colors.

plugin.name: Vanilla Campsite Rocks
plugin.description: Changes the campsite rocks into vanilla, or in the case of Embers HD flames, Embers HD rocks. Supported options Embers XD style, default or orange flames, or Embers HD flames.

plugin.name: Hearthfire Crispy Dumplings
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Hearthfire Crispy Dumplings by Kadraeus.

plugin.name: Windhelm Braziers BOS
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Windhelm Braziers BOS. Not compatible with the original Windhelm Braziers (use the patch from the Windhelm Braziers mod page instead).
⚠️ Requires Base Object Swapper.

plugin.name: Windhelm Braziers BOS + Lanterns of Skyrim II
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Windhelm Braziers BOS with Lanterns of Skyrim II. Only affects Windhelm so you still need the main Lanterns of Skyrim II patch. Not compatible with the original Windhelm Braziers (use the patch from the Windhelm Braziers mod page instead).
⚠️ Requires Base Object Swapper.

plugin.name: High Fantasy Pack - Mihail Monsters and Animals
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for High Fantasy Pack - Mihail Monsters and Animals.

plugin.name: High Minotaurs - Mihail Monsters and Animals
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for High Minotaurs - Mihail Monsters and Animals.

plugin.name: Minotaurs - Mihail Monsters and Animals
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Minotaurs - Mihail Monsters and Animals.

plugin.name: Goblins - Mihail Monsters and Animals
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Goblins - Mihail Monsters and Animals.

plugin.name: Goblins and Riekrs - Mihail Monsters and Animals
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Goblins and Riekrs - Mihail Monsters and Animals.

plugin.name: Bolgans - Mihail Monsters and Animals
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Bolgans - Mihail Monsters and Animals.

plugin.name: Riverwood by Schlitzohr (Another Riverwood)
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Riverwood by Schlitzohr (plugin name: Another Riverwood).

plugin.name: Breezehome by Lupus
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Breezehome by Lupus.

plugin.name: Lux Via
plugin.description:
A minor compatibility patch for Lux Via.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: Arthmoor's Shor's Stone
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Arthmoor's Shor's Stone.

plugin.name: Giant Campfires Cast Shadows
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Giant Campfires Cast Shadows, Lux and other similar mods that add shadow casting lightsources inside giant campfires, resulting in twitchy lighting and shadows with vanilla campfires. Note that this will cause the logs to become semi-transparent when particle light from ENBSeries is rendered on top of them so you need to pick your poison.

plugin.name: Breezehome TNF Expanded for SSE Redux
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Breezehome TNF Expanded for SSE Redux.

plugin.name: Breezehome TNF - Trapdoors of Whiterun SE
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Breezehome TNF - Trapdoors of Whiterun SE.

plugin.name: TNF Skyrim House Remodel
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for TNF Skyrim House Remodel.

plugin.name: ELFX
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Enhanced Lights and FX.

plugin.name: ELFX Exteriors
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Enhanced Lights and FX.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: JK's Dragonsreach
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for JK's Dragonsreach.

plugin.name: EEK's Beautiful Whiterun + Dawn of Skyrim
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for EEK's Beautiful Whiterun and Dawn of Skyrim.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: EEK's Beautiful Whiterun + JK's Skyrim
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for EEK's Beautiful Whiterun and JK's Skyrim.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: EEK's Beautiful Whiterun + JK's Whiterun
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for EEK's Beautiful Whiterun and JK's Whiterun.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: EEK's Whiterun Interiors
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for EEK's Whiterun Interiors.

plugin.name: EEK's Bannered Mare
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for EEK's Bannered Mare.

plugin.name: Eli's Breezehome
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Eli's Breezehome.

plugin.name: Capital Windhelm Expansion
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Capital Windhelm Expansion.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: JK's Skyrim
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for JK's Skyrim.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: Lux Orbis + Lanterns of Skyrim II
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Lux Orbis and Lanterns of Skyrim II, fixing floating fires at Whiterun.

plugin.name: JK's Skyrim + Lanterns of Skyrim II
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for JK's Skyrim and Lanterns of Skyrim II.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: JK's Skyrim + ELFX Exteriors
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for JK's Skyrim and ELFX Exteriors.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: JK's Skyrim + Lanterns of Skyrim II + ELFX Exteriors
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for JK's Skyrim, Lanterns of Skyrim II and ELFX Exteriors.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.
Suggested Load Order:
01 Lanterns Of Skyrim II.esm
02 Embers XD.esp
03 ELFX Exteriors.esp
04 JKs Skyrim.esp
05 LoS II - JKs Skyrim patch.esp
06 LoS II - ELFXpatch.esp
07 Embers XD - Patch - JKs Skyrim - LOS2 - ELFX Exteriors.esp

plugin.name: JK's Skyrim + Lanterns of Skyrim II + Capital Windhelm Expansion
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for JK's Skyrim, Lanterns of Skyrim II and Capital Windhelm Expansion.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.
Suggested Load Order:
01 Lanterns Of Skyrim II.esm
02 Embers XD.esp
03 ELFX Exteriors
04 JKs Skyrim.esp
05 WindhelmSSE.esp
06 Capital Windhelm Expansion - JK'sSkyrim Patch.esp
07 LoS II - JKs Skyrim patch.esp
08 LoS II - ELFX patch.esp
09 Embers XD - Patch - JKs Skyrim - LOS2...esp

plugin.name: JK's Skyrim + LoS II + Capital Windhelm Expansion + ELFX Exteriors
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for JK's Skyrim, Lanterns of Skyrim II, Capital Windhelm Expansion and ELFX Exteriors.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: JK's Skyrim + Capital Windhelm Expansion + ELFX Exteriors
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for JK's Skyrim, Capital Windhelm Expansion and ELFX Exteriors combination.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: JK's Skyrim + Capital Windhelm Expansion
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for JK's Skyrim and Capital Windhelm Expansion combination.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: Cultured Orc Furniture
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Kelretu's and Maar Malur's Cultured Orc Furniture. If you're using ElSopa's HD Medieval Anvil SE, only choose the patch below and not this one.

plugin.name: Cultured Orc Furniture + ElSopa's HD Medieval Anvil SE
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Kelretu's and Maar Malur's Cultured Orc Furniture and ElSopa's HD Medieval Anvil SE. If you're using ElSopa's HD Medieval Anvil SE, only choose this patch and not the one above.

plugin.name: Skyrim 3D Blacksmith (Original)
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Mathy's Skyrim 3D Blacksmith.

plugin.name: Skyrim 3D Blacksmith (Without Logs)
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Mathy's Skyrim 3D Blacksmith. This option removes the logs among the forge coals.

plugin.name: Skyrim 3D Cooking
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Mathy's Skyrim 3D Cooking.

plugin.name: Mathy's Medieval Torch
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Mathy's Medieval Torch. You do not need this patch if you're not installing the Torches Add-On.
⚠️ If you also use Smoking Torches and Candles, only choose the patch for Mathy's Medieval Torch for Smoking Torches And Candles instead.

plugin.name: Mathy's Medieval Torch (Proper Wield)
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Mathy's Medieval Torch. You do not need this patch if you're not installing the Torches Add-On.
⚠️ If you also use Smoking Torches and Candles, only choose the patch for Mathy's Medieval Torch for Smoking Torches And Candles instead.

plugin.name: Mathy's Medieval Torch for Smoking Torches And Candles
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Mathy's Medieval Torch for Smoking Torches And Candles. You do not need this patch if you're not installing the Torches Add-On.
⚠️ Do not install the separate patch for Mathy's Medieval Torch above, it's not needed.

plugin.name: Mathy's Medieval Torch for Smoking Torches And Candles (Proper Wield)
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Mathy's Medieval Torch for Smoking Torches And Candles. You do not need this patch if you're not installing the Torches Add-On.
⚠️ Do not install the separate patch for Mathy's Medieval Torch above, it's not needed.

plugin.name: Smoking Torches And Candles
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Smoking Torches And Candles. You do not need this patch if you're not installing the Torches Add-On.
⚠️ If you also use Mathy's Medieval Torch, be sure to choose that as well.

plugin.name: Rodryk's DragonBridge
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Rodryk's DragonBridge.

plugin.name: ClefJ's Morthal
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for ClefJ's Morthal.

plugin.name: ClefJ's Winterhold
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for ClefJ's Winterhold.

plugin.name: ClefJ's Karthwasten
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for ClefJ's Karthwasten.

plugin.name: Half-Moon Chalet
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Half-Moon Chalet and Forges Add-On.

plugin.name: Riverwood Inn By Nesbit
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Riverwood Inn By Nesbit.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: Skyrim Farmhouse Inns
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Skyrim Farmhouse Inns By Nesbit.

plugin.name: Lanterns of Skyrim II
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Lanterns of Skyrim II.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: Lanterns of Skyrim II + ELFX Exteriors
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Lanterns of Skyrim II and ELFX Exteriors.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: Tamriel Master Lights - Standard Version
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Tamriel Master Lights - Standard Version.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: Tamriel Master Lights - Cities Version
plugin.description:
A compatibility patch for Tamriel Master Lights - Cities Version.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: ENB Light - Magic Hand FX
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for ENB Light - Magic Hand FX and Embers XD Magick Add-On. Make sure to load the patch after ENB Light.

plugin.name: Perseids Inns and Taverns - Realistic Room Rental Enhanced
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Perseids Inns and Taverns - Realistic Room Rental Enhanced.

plugin.name: Breezehome TNF Beds Plus
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Breezehome TNF Beds Plus.

plugin.name: Houses Shops and Inns SE
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Houses Shops and Inns SE All-In-One version.

plugin.name: EEK's Immersive Whiterun
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for EEK's Immersive Whiterun.

plugin.name: Goldenhills Plantation
plugin.description: A small patch for Goldenhills Plantation (CC/AE Content) that adds a proper fire in the fireplace.

plugin.name: LUFTSHIP K747
plugin.description:
A small patch that fixes the floating fire at the base of the scaffolding leading to the ship.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: Rest By Campfire
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for both the original Rest By Campfire and Rest By Campfire - Base Object Swapper.

fileDependency.file: Rest By Campfire - Base Object Swapper.esp

plugin.name: Realistic Lighting Overhaul Exteriors
plugin.description:
A patch for Realistic Lighting Overhaul (RLO) Exteriors.
⚠️ Do not use when using the Lux Orbis plugin.

plugin.name: Legacy of the Dragonborn
plugin.description: A patch for Legacy of the Dragonborn.

plugin.name: SunHelm Survival
plugin.description: A patch for SunHelm Survival.

plugin.name: Beyond Skyrim - Bruma
plugin.description: A patch for Beyond Skyrim - Bruma.

plugin.name: Sneak Tools
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Sneak Tools.

plugin.name: Survival Mode
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Survival Mode Creation (ccqdrsse001-survivalmode).

plugin.name: Survival Mode Improved
plugin.description: A compatibility patch for Survival Mode Improved.

plugin.name: Legacy Compatibility Patch
plugin.description: A missing texture workaround for Embers XD 2.7.5+ and mods using legacy content such as Sneak Tools patch by nikita0061 and Castle Volkihar Remake 2023 by rdrift.
